sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-navigation-drawer
    v-model="isVisible"
    class="side-bar"
    absolute
    temporary
    style="width: 100vw !important;height: auto !important;"
    :color="`${this.$vuetify.theme.currentTheme.background}ac`"
  >
    <v-list
      nav
      dense
      style="display: flex;"
    >
      <v-list-item-group
        active-class="deep-purple--text text--accent-4"
        style="text-align: center;display: flex;flex-direction: row;justify-content: space-between;"
      >
        <v-list-item
        >
          <v-list-item-icon
            style="align-self: center !important;"
          >
            <v-icon>mdi-help</v-icon>
          </v-list-item-icon>
          <v-list-item-title
          >
            О проекте
          </v-list-item-title>
        </v-list-item>
        <v-spacer />
        <v-list-item
        >
          <v-list-item-icon
              style="align-self: center !important;"
          >
            <v-icon>mdi-help</v-icon>
          </v-list-item-icon>
          <v-list-item-title
              style="color:red;"
          >
            Выйти
          </v-list-item-title>
        </v-list-item>
      </v-list-item-group>
    </v-list>
  </v-navigation-drawer>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: "the-side-bar",
  data: () => ({
    isVisible: false
  }),
  methods: {
    toggleVisible() {
      this.isVisible = !this.isVisible;
    }
  }
}
</script>
